}} 'Threshold' is a 2003 Sci-Fi Pictures original film adaptation of the 1958
black and white science fiction film [[It! The Terror from Beyond Space]]
(directed by Edward L. Cahn). The film stars Nicholas Lea (The X-Files' Alex
Krycek), Jamie Luner (Melrose Place's Lexi Sterling) and Steve Bacic (Gene
Roddenberry's Andromeda). Other notable cast members include Teryl Rothery,
television mogul Stephen J. Cannell (as Pacheco Laval) and Gloria Slade.
